overview: It's time for more steamy, passionate lesbian stories for you! These lovely ladies exemplify the meaning of passionate sex as they take each other on an orgasmic journey with their tongues, fingers and more. Starring our gorgeous: Elle Alexandra , Sophia Jade, Edyn Blair, Tegan Riley, Brett Rossi, Vanessa Veracruz , Alex Ann and Natalie Heart.
title: Forbidden Desire
